author: The Associated Press
title: Retail businesses reopen in Wuhan, China's original coronavirus epicentre
description: Shopkeepers in the city where China's virus outbreak began are reopening, but customers remain scarce after authorities lifted more of the anti-virus controls that kept tens of millions of people at home for two months.
content:
Shopkeepers in the city where China's virus outbreak began were reopening Monday, but customers were scarce after authorities lifted more of the anti-virus controls that kept tens of millions of people at home for two months.
"I'm so excited, I want to cry,"… [+5946 chars]
